chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
E2: Rbar -> Prop
E1: Rbar -> Prop
l2: Rbar
l1: Rbar

Goal:
(forall x : Rbar, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_glb E1 l1 -> Rbar_is_glb E2 l2 -> l1 = l2

Premises:
Rbar_is_glb = fun (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => Rbar_is_lower_bound E l /\ (forall b : Rbar, Rbar_is_lower_bound E b -> Rbar_le b l) : (Rbar -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
Inductive Rbar : Set := Finite : R -> Rbar | p_infty : Rbar | m_infty : Rbar For Finite: Argument scope is [R_scope]
Rbar_is_glb_subset : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l1 l2 : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E2 x -> E1 x) -> Rbar_is_glb E1 l1 -> Rbar_is_glb E2 l2 -> Rbar_le l1 l2
Rbar_is_lub_eq : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l1 l2 : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_lub E1 l1 -> Rbar_is_lub E2 l2 -> l1 = l2
Rbar_is_lub_subset : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l1 l2 : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x -> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_lub E1 l1 -> Rbar_is_lub E2 l2 -> Rbar_le l1 l2
Tauto.eval_f_morph : forall (ex : ?TX -> Prop) (ev ev' : ?TA -> Prop) (f : Tauto.GFormula), (forall a : ?TA, ev a <-> ev' a) -> Tauto.eval_f ex ev f < -> Tauto.eval_f ex ev' f where ?TA : [E1 : Rbar -> Prop E2 : Rbar -> Prop l1 : Rbar l2 : Rbar |- Type] ?TX : [E1 : Rbar -> Prop E2 : Rbar -> Prop l1 : Rbar l2 : Rbar |- Type] ?AA : [E1 : Rbar -> Prop E2 : Rbar -> Prop l1 : Rbar l2 : Rbar |- Type] ?AF : [E1 : Rbar -> Prop E2 : Rbar -> Prop l1 : Rbar l2 : Rbar |- Type]
Lub_Rbar_eqset : forall E1 E2 : R -> Prop, (forall x : R, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Lub_Rbar E1 = Lub_Rbar E2
Glb_Rbar_eqset : forall E1 E2 : R -> Prop, (forall x : R, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Glb_Rbar E1 = Glb_Rbar E2
Rbar_is_lb_subset : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x -> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_lower_bound E2 l -> Rbar_is_lower_bound E1 l
is_glb_Rbar_eqset : forall (E1 E2 : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : R, E2 x <-> E1 x) -> is_glb_Rbar E1 l -> is_glb_Rbar E2 l
is_lub_Rbar_eqset : forall (E1 E2 : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : R, E2 x <-> E1 x) -> is_lub_Rbar E1 l -> is_lub_Rbar E2 l
is_lb_Rbar_subset : forall (E1 E2 : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : R, E2 x -> E1 x) -> is_lb_Rbar E1 l -> is_lb_Rbar E2 l
is_ub_Rbar_subset : forall (E1 E2 : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : R, E2 x -> E1 x) -> is_ub_Rbar E1 l -> is_ub_Rbar E2 l
Tauto.GFormula_ind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Prop, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall (o : option ?AF) (g0 : Tauto.GFormula), P g0 -> P (Tauto.I g o g0)) -> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [E1 : Rbar -> Prop E2 : Rbar ->...-> Prop l1 : Rbar l2 : Rbar |- Type]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0%nat (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [E1 : Rbar -> Prop E2 : Rbar -> Prop l1 : Rbar l2 : Rbar |- Type] ?B : [E1 : Rbar -> Prop E2 : Rbar -> Prop l1 : Rbar l2 : Rbar |- Type]
Rbar_is_glb_unique : forall (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_glb E l -> Rbar_glb E = l
is_glb_Rbar_correct : forall (E : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar), is_glb_Rbar E l < -> Rbar_is_glb (fun x : Rbar => is_finite x /\ E x) l
Rbar_ex_glb : forall E : Rbar -> Prop, {l : Rbar | Rbar_is_glb E l}
Rbar_lub_glb : forall (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => E (Rbar_opp x)) (Rbar_opp l) < -> Rbar_is_glb E l
Rbar_glb_lub : forall (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_glb (fun x : Rbar => E (Rbar_opp x)) (Rbar_opp l) < -> Rbar_is_lub E l
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_imp_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_iff_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) /\ (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) < -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q)
PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropFunExt : (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q
PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropExt : (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall A B : Prop, A < -> B -> A = B
Build_Metric_Space : forall (Base : Type) (dist : Base -> Base -> R), (forall x y : Base, dist x y >= 0) -> (forall x y : Base, dist x y = dist y x) -> (forall x y : Base, dist x y = 0 <-> x = y) -> (forall x y z : Base, dist x y <= dist x z + dist z y) -> Metric_Space
Rbar_is_lower_bound = fun (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => forall x : Rbar, E x -> Rbar_le l x : (Rbar -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
Rbar_is_upper_bound = fun (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => forall x : Rbar, E x -> Rbar_le x l : (Rbar -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
Rbar_ub_m_infty : forall E : Rbar -> Prop, Rbar_is_upper_bound E m_infty -> forall x : Rbar, E x -> x = m_infty
Rbar_lb_p_infty : forall E : Rbar -> Prop, Rbar_is_lower_bound E p_infty -> forall x : Rbar, E x -> x = p_infty
Rbar_lb_eq_ub : forall (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_lower_bound E l -> Rbar_is_upper_bound E l -> forall x : Rbar, E x -> x = l
Rbar_is_lub = fun (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => Rbar_is_upper_bound E l /\ (forall b : Rbar, Rbar_is_upper_bound E b -> Rbar_le l b) : (Rbar -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
Rbar_inv_opp : forall x : Rbar, x <> 0 -> Rbar_inv (Rbar_opp x) = Rbar_opp (Rbar_inv x)
is_glb_Rbar = fun (E : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => is_lb_Rbar E l /\ (forall b : Rbar, is_lb_Rbar E b -> Rbar_le b l) : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_lub_Rbar = fun (E : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => is_ub_Rbar E l /\ (forall b : Rbar, is_ub_Rbar E b -> Rbar_le l b) : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_Rbar_plus = fun x y z : Rbar => Rbar_plus' x y = Some z : Rbar -> Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
is_Rbar_mult = fun x y z : Rbar => Rbar_mult' x y = Some z : Rbar -> Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
Rbar_minus = fun x y : Rbar => Rbar_plus x (Rbar_opp y) : Rbar -> Rbar -> Rbar
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
Rbar_le_antisym : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_le y x -> x = y
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
is_lb_Rbar = fun (E : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => forall x : R, E x -> Rbar_le l x : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_ub_Rbar = fun (E : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => forall x : R, E x -> Rbar_le x l : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]

```coq
intros H1 H2 H3 H4.
apply Rbar_is_glb_unique.
split.
- intros x Ex.
  specialize (H2 x).
  apply iff_sym, H1, H2.
- intros b Hb.
  apply iff_sym, H1.
  apply H3.
  intros x Ex.
  apply iff_sym, H1, Hb, Ex.
Qed.
Qed.```

original: intros H1 H2 H3 H4. apply Rbar_is_glb_unique. split. - intros x Ex. specialize (H2 x). apply iff_sym, H1, H2. - intros b Hb. apply iff_sym, H1. apply H3. intros x Ex. apply iff_sym, H1, Hb, Ex.
